item.title: Deob Client Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“smg, post:1, topic:416345”]Hi i have been making a server recently and i never really used player vs player in my source and when i tested out any item on a npc it worked fine but when it was a player then it froze the deob client and gave this error:

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method34(client.java:1433) at client.method146(client.java:12060) at client.method102(client.java:7906) at client.method9(client.java:8793) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:137) at client.run(client.java:4558) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

i have been trying to find fixes for this but have not found a single one on google or any help topics… so if anyone knows how to fix please notify me.

Source: CLEANED Delta
Client: Completely blank 317 deob

For the client i added alot of coding and was able to get it working with the delta but i cant seem to figure this one out so please help if anyone can. Thanks, Smg[/quote]

Post method34 from client.java

Read full topic
